#
# top-level help
#
exec provisioner-1 -h
! stderr .
cmp stdout top-level-help.txt

#
# install help
#
exec provisioner-1 install -h
! stderr .
cmp stdout install-help.txt

#
# configure help
#
exec provisioner-1 configure -h
! stderr .
cmp stdout configure-help.txt
